flawed_nl_solution:
He runs the race in 5/15=2/3 of an hour
So he runs the race in 60/3=<<60/3=20>>20 minutes
That means he beat the next fastest guy by 23-20=<<23-20=3>>3 minutes

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 5/15, not 2/3. It appears there was an off-by-one error in the fraction.
